alert.note: Alert for Inland Willacy; Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Hidalgo, northwestern Cameron and southwestern Willacy Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jose Borrego Middle School, or near Hargill, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elsa, Hargill, Lasara, Sebastian, Jose Borrego Middle School, La Blanca, Elsa Public Library, Lasara Elementary School, Carlos Truan Junior High School and Monte Alto. This includes Interstate Highway 69 E between mile markers 38 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
